This blog is run by [Daniela Palleschi](daniela-palleschi.github.io), a researcher and lecturer at the Institute of German Language and Linguistics (Institut für deutsche Sprache und Linguistik) at the Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin. Her current position includes teaching statistics and quantitative methods, as well as providing consultations on these topics to students. 

Blog posts are typically written with students in mind, with the aim of addressing common problems that they seem to have.
